name: Camille's Breaktrough
description:
Journalist who clones objects with his camera to solve mysteries

              Camille is just an intern on the biggest news channel ever, the acclaimed Big World News, and she spends her days writing unimportant news. When the channel's most famous pivot is fired because, in the previous week, after reporting anomalies found in the city's largest factory. She has no doubt that this will be her door to stand out in Big World News. 
              Camille has to be discreet, not raising any alarms until she gets to the factory office, to find out what's happening.

• Environment with a hand-drawn artistic style, based on Cartoons.

• Solve puzzles using the objects arround Camille.

• Clone objects through Camille's Camera.

Credits

Camille's Breaktrough is compatible with most computer keyboards. 
It was developed by Westfell Studios for a college project. 

➛Diogo Sousa (Game Designer) -

A Special thanks to Octavian Codrea for providing Camille's game font! Keyboard Controls:

                       Movement:                                                Actions:                        

               | Space |          |  ← → |                                  Z  - Record 
                                                                                     X  -  Clone

                 Jump               Move                                    C  - Swap
